body.header: These comments about the advantages and disadvantages of having a computer at home have been rewritten in a more formal style. Fill each gap with an appropriate comparative structure using one of the adjectives provided.

ol.li: By using chat and e-mail, it's easier to come into contact with people from all over the world – something we couldn't do in the past.Computers allow people to have a social circle than in the past.

Computer games can be addictive and people who get hooked often stop doing things that are really essential.Some people become addicted to computers and, as a result, they are distracted from doing other, things.
I've noticed that since I bought my computer I spend far more time sitting down than I used to.Computers have resulted in many people leading a lifestyle.
My reactions have definitely speeded up since I started playing computer games at home.Computer games give people reactions.
People spend more time indoors as a result of computers so they don't speak to their neighbours as much.People are as they were in the past.
I think some computer games are very educational. I'm sure they've improved my son's ability to think logically.Computer games may help people to think in a way.

I know that some doctors worry that all this sitting in front of computers all day, even in one's free time, is having a really bad effect on people's health.People are as they were in the past as a result of using computers.

One of the wonderful things about computers and the Internet is that I can exchange information with people all over the world who have the same hobby as me – I collect dolls.Having a home computer makes it to exchange information with people all over the world.

These days you can find information about almost anything on the Web. I think I've really broadened my knowledge about all sorts of things since I've had Internet access from home.For some people, Internet access at home has helped them become .

Before computer games arrived, children used to spend more of their time building models or painting or inventing stories. They just don't do those things anymore.Children are in their free time than they used to be.
